item.title: 10 Basic Tips on Bash Scripting to Optimize Your Operation Work
item.description: Shell programming is such an essential skill that you need to master, if you want to step further into the Linux/Unix world. Being able to program on shell will accelerate your operation work. Because in daily operation, you cannot avoid searching&analying logs, running and proceeding other system scripts periodically, etc. I know it may bore you easily, that is why I want to write down those tips. Bash Shell Script Basics We usually call it as Bash Shell, because Bash is the most widely used shell interpreter.
